## Source: amazon-inspector (6230992468654fdc80201d169ead3ce06356bb7cf36f8367f076d438035959a5)
The package realestate-atlas was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (de6887823445d411abe13529f414da9588edf68ffaa79a589a15a0405c6df116)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'realestate-atlas' @ 3.5.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
